title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library and asyncio client for the Ollama server.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama (Node & browsers via fetch).

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package allowing Ollama models as LangChain LLMs/embedders.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI for Ollama (OpenAI-style API compatible) with model management, import/export, RAG, multi-user, e.t.c.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Convenient interactive CLI wrapper for chatting with Ollama models written in Python.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Lightweight GitHub Copilot-like VS Code extension that uses local Ollama models for code completion.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) example using Ollama + ChromaDB + LangChain in Python.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that replies via Ollama LLMs; supports slash commands and model swapping.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as Generators or Embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama4j (Java client)
summary: Unofficial Java/Kotlin client library for the Ollama API with async and streaming support.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community C#/.NET client for Ollama with async methods and example console chat.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with optional GPU node selection.

title: ollama-terraform
summary: Terraform module that spins up an EC2 GPU instance with Ollama server pre-installed.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama API.

title: ollama-go
summary: Community-maintained Go client for Ollama with generate/chat helpers and streaming.

title: ollama-npm (npm search)
summary: Curated list of npm packages tagged 'ollama' including the official JS client and community wrappers.

title: ollama-pypi (PyPI search)
summary: PyPI packages matching 'ollama' keyword: official ollama, langchain-ollama, ollama-cli, etc.

title: r/ollama Reddit community
summary: Active subreddit for discussing Ollama usage, model tips, and ecosystem projects.

title: Ollama topic on GitHub
summary: GitHub topic page aggregating 200+ open-source tools, examples, and integrations tagged 'ollama'.
